definition: the special line of work you have adopted as your career
details:
noun
- the special line of work you have adopted as your career
= example: the special line of work you have adopted as your career
= synonyms: specialisation, specialty, speciality, specialism
- the act of specializing
= synonyms: specialisation
- (biology) the structural adaptation of some body part for a particular function
= synonyms: specialisation, differentiation
